index.title: Spectrum of Hope
index.intro: This is the silent, profound struggle of a beautiful soul navigating a world that wasn't built for her. We share our story not in search of answers, but in an attempt to open a window into the reality of severe autism—a reality defined by immense love, exhaustion, and the unwavering fight to secure a path forward for our daughter.
